verses.name: Deuteronomy 11:14
verses.text: That I will give you the rain of your land in his due season, the first rain and the latter rain, that thou mayest gather in thy corn, and thy wine, and thine oil.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 11:15
verses.text: And I will send grass in thy fields for thy cattle, that thou mayest eat and be full.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 11:16
verses.text: Take heed to yourselves, that your heart be not deceived, and ye turn aside, and serve other gods, and worship them;
